Package hu.klenium.tetris.view

Class MainApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • hu.klenium.tetris.view.MainApplication
  • public class MainApplication
extends Application
    Manages the JavaFX Application. The application is created by calling init(Runnable). At first, the window is empty, a new game must call createFrame(Dimension, int) to add elements.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

        Application.Parameters

      The application's scene, it stores all GUI elements.

    • Method Detail

      • createFrame

        public static GameFrame createFrame​(Dimension gridSize,
                                    int blockSize)
        Creates a new frame that a new game can use to display it's state.
        Parameters:
        blockSize - Size of displayed cells.
        gridSize - Size of the displayed board's grid.
        Returns:
        A new GameFrame (a part of the window).

      • init

        public static void init​(Runnable task)
        Initializes the application, when done, calls task.
        Parameters:
        task - Called when the application is ready to use.

      • start

        public void start​(Stage primaryStage)
        Automatically called when the application is ready. Cunfigures the window's common properties. When done, calls readyTask.
        Specified by:
        start in class Application
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - Created by JavaFX platform, each GUI element's parent. Used to show the main window.
